explanation: The original program only checks if A and B are specific adjacent pairs instead of checking if they are adjacent horizontally on the board. The condition was incorrectly checking if A and B were adjacent (B-A == 1) but mistakenly included a condition that was invalid (A-B == 9), which doesn't apply here since it violates the constraint A < B. The correct condition should simply check if the difference is 1 (B-A == 1) to indicate horizontal adjacency. This change was inspired by diff patterns that checked differences instead of specific pairs.
